pullRequest.title: Fix bug: Use try-with-resources or close this "Socket" in a "finally" clause.
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the pull request
#1714
Fix bug: Use try-with-resources or close this "Socket" in a "finally" clause.
Brief change log

Use try-with-resources with Socket, prepareStatement.
Add connection.close() at executeFuncAndSql.
Fix some code smell.
